name: The British Bulldogs
description: The legendary professional wrestling tag team of cousins Davey Boy Smith (The British Bulldog) and Dynamite Kid (Tom Billington), known for their high-impact style in the 1980s

name: The Whole Fuckin' Show
description: They blended RVD’s martial arts style with Sabu’s hardcore, table-breaking antics. They won the ECW World Tag Team Championship twice, blending aerial grace with extreme violence.

name: The Trailblazers
description: High flying duo with amazing moves. With talent that transcends time.

name: Desolation Smile
description: The Ugandan Giant Kamala and the insane Daemon are just a pairing made in hell.

name: The Mega Powers
description: An unlikely but dominant pairing of the Macho Man and the 8th Wonder of the World.
